competitors.name: Splunk
competitors.notes: Established player in log management and SIEM

competitors.name: New Relic
competitors.notes: Founded in 2008, application performance monitoring platform

context: Datadog was founded in 2010 by Olivier Pomel and Alexis Le-Quoc. The cloud monitoring industry was just emerging. Early competitors included established monitoring tools (Nagios, Zabbix) and emerging cloud-native platforms.
